name: Pixel Island Survival
description:
Survive on an archipelago of uninhabited islands after a maritime disaster! Build shelter, create objects, discover secrets and follow a fascinating storyline!

This is an early prototype of this game! You can expect updates in the near future! We recommend that you subscribe to the game so that you don't miss any information about the development of the game! We are open to community ideas! Write what you think about the game and what we could add/change to make it even better!

Our objectives:

  • creating a fascinating cutscene
  • creation of a cooking system
  • The opportunity to travel between different islands

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

The game will have frequent updates so we recommend using the Itch launcher. If you do not have it you can download it from here: 

https://itch.io/app

Important links:
